## Suggested Social Activity

Monday: [University Town Center (UTC)](https://www.shopirvinecompany.com/centers/irvine/university-center)

Tuesday: Hiking in [Crystal Cove State Park](http://www.crystalcovestatepark.org/hiking-2/) / [Bommer Canyon Trail](https://letsgooutside.org/explore/bommer-canyon/) / [UCI Ecological Reserve](https://ecopreserve.ucnrs.org)

Wednesday: Costa Mesa

Thursday: Laguna Beach

Friday: Stay out of traffic if you can

Slack channel `#social`

## Photo Day

## Social Media

Please put a big cross mark on your name tag to indicate that you do not want to be photographed/your photo to be shared. 
Otherwise we/other participants will assume you are ok with being photographed and your photo being shared. 

If you share any photos/news/comments on social media feel free to use `#BayesBATS`.
